fields.name: ElevationLevel
fields.description: nonAdmin - The auto user is a standard user without elevated access. admin - The auto user is a user with elevated access and operates with full Administrator permissions. The default value is nonAdmin.

fields.name: LinuxUserConfiguration
fields.description: This property is ignored if specified on a Windows pool. If not specified, the user is created with the default options.

fields.name: WindowsUserConfiguration
fields.description: This property can only be specified if the user is on a Windows pool. If not specified and on a Windows pool, the user is created with the default options.
